GR14mdhvkmou:1: arcitaḥ saṃsmṛto dhyātaḥ kīrtitaḥ kathitaḥ śrutaḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:2: yo dadāty amṛtatvaṃ hi sa māṃ rakṣatu keśavaḥ. // MKm_1 //
GR14mdhvkmou:3: tāpatrayeṇa saṃtaptaṃ yad etad akhilaṃ jagat
GR14mdhvkmou:4: vakṣyāmi śāntaye hy asya kṛṣṇāmṛtamahārṇavam. // MKm_2 //
GR14mdhvkmou:5: te narāḥ paśavo loke kiṃ teṣāṃ jīvane phalam
GR14mdhvkmou:6: yair na labdhā harer dīkṣā nārcito vā janārdanaḥ. // MKm_3 //
GR14mdhvkmou:8: ayam eko mahābhāgaḥ pūjyate yad adhokṣajaḥ. // MKm_4 //
GR14mdhvkmou:9: sa nāma sukṛtī loke kulaṃ tena hy alaṃkṛtam
GR14mdhvkmou:10: ādhāraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yena viṣṇuḥ prasāditaḥ. // MKm_5 //
GR14mdhvkmou:11: yajñānāṃ tapasāṃ caiva śubhānāṃ caiva karmaṇāṃ
GR14mdhvkmou:14: ye 'rcayanti narā nityaṃ te 'pi vandyā yathā hariḥ. // MKm_7 //
GR14mdhvkmou:15: nāsti śreyaskaraṃ nṛṇāṃ viṣṇor ārādhanān mune
GR14mdhvkmou:16: yuge 'smiṃs tāmase loke satataṃ pūjyate nṛbhiḥ. // MKm_8 //
GR14mdhvkmou:18: arcitāḥ sarvadevāḥ syur yataḥ sarvagato hariḥ. // MKm_9 //
GR14mdhvkmou:20: keśave kaṃsakeśighne na yāti narakaṃ naraḥ. // MKm_10 //
GR14mdhvkmou:22: muktibhāgī nirātaṅkī viṣṇuloke ciraṃ vaset. // MKm_11 //
GR14mdhvkmou:24: sa yāti paramaṃ sthānaṃ yat surair api durlabham. // MKm_12 //
GR14mdhvkmou:27: sākṣād bhagavato viṣṇoḥ pūjanaṃ janmanaḥ phalam. // MKm_13 //
GR14mdhvkmou:30: harir dadāti hi phalaṃ sarvayajñaiś ca durlabham. // MKm_14 //
GR14mdhvkmou:32: phalaṃ dadāti sulabhaṃ salilenāpi pūjitaḥ. // MKm_15 //
GR14mdhvkmou:34: kiṃ tvayā nārcito devaḥ keśavaḥ kleśanāśanaḥ. // MKm_16 //
GR14mdhvkmou:37: smaraṇān muktido nṛṇāṃ sa tvayā kiṃ na pūjitaḥ. // MKm_17 //
GR14mdhvkmou:38: dravyāṇām apy abhāve tu salilenāpi pūjitaḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:39: yo dadāti svakaṃ sthānaṃ sa tvayā kiṃ na pūjitaḥ. // MKm_18 //
GR14mdhvkmou:41: na prāptā yair harer dīkṣā sarvaduḥkhavimocanī. // MKm_19 //
GR14mdhvkmou:44: yat kṛtaṃ tatkṛtaṃ tena samprāptaṃ paramaṃ padam. // MKm_20 //
GR14mdhvkmou:48: praṇāmaṃ ye 'pi kurvanti teṣām api namo namaḥ. // MKm_22 //
GR14mdhvkmou:51: na hi samprāpyate śreṣṭhaṃ tasmād ārādhayācyutam. // MKm_23 //
GR14mdhvkmou:53: paraḥ parāṇāṃ puruṣas tuṣṭo yasya janārdanaḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:54: sa cā 'pnoty akṣayaṃ sthānam etat satyaṃ mayoditam. // MKm_24 //
GR14mdhvkmou:57: tam ārādhaya govindaṃ sthānam agryaṃ yadīcchasi. // MKm_25 //
GR14mdhvkmou:59: paraṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma yo 'sau brahma sanātanam
GR14mdhvkmou:60: tam ārādhya hariṃ yāti muktim apy atidurlabhām. // MKm_26 //
GR14mdhvkmou:61: aindram indraḥ paraṃ sthānaṃ yam ārādhya jagatpatim
GR14mdhvkmou:62: prāpa yajñapatiṃ viṣṇuṃ tam ārādhaya suvrata. // MKm_27 //
GR14mdhvkmou:63: prāpnoty ārādhite viṣṇau manasā yad yad icchati
GR14mdhvkmou:66: sarvapāpavinirmuktāḥ paraṃ brahma viśanti te. // MKm_29 //
GR14mdhvkmou:67: tato 'niruddhaṃ deveśaṃ pradyumnaṃ ca tataḥ param
GR14mdhvkmou:68: tataḥ saṃkarṣaṇaṃ devaṃ vāsudevaṃ parāt param. // MKm_30 //
GR14mdhvkmou:70: vāsudevaṃ praviṣṭānāṃ punar āvartanaṃ kutaḥ. // MKm_31 //
GR14mdhvkmou:72: yo yān icchen naraḥ kāmān nārī vā varavarṇinī
GR14mdhvkmou:73: tān samāpnoti vipulān samārādhya janārdhanam. // MKm_32 //
GR14mdhvkmou:76: bāhubhyāṃ sāgaraṃ tartuṃ ka iccheta pumān bhuvi
GR14mdhvkmou:77: vāsudevam anārādhya ko mokṣaṃ gantum icchati. // MKm_33 //
GR14mdhvkmou:79: kṛte pāpe 'nutāpo vai yasya puṃsaḥ prajāyate
GR14mdhvkmou:80: prāyaścittaṃ tu tasyoktaṃ harisaṃsmaraṇaṃ param. // MKm_34 //
GR14mdhvkmou:81: na hy apuṇyavatāṃ loke mūḍhānāṃ kuṭilātmanāṃ
GR14mdhvkmou:82: bhaktir bhavati govinde smaraṇaṃ kīrtanaṃ tathā. // MKm_35 //
GR14mdhvkmou:84: jitendriyo viśuddhātmā yadaiva smarate harim. // MKm_36 //
GR14mdhvkmou:86: na kaścit smarate devaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kalimalāpaham. // MKm_37 //
GR14mdhvkmou:88: karoti martyo mūḍhātmā smaraṇaṃ kīrtanaṃ hareḥ. // MKm_38 //
GR14mdhvkmou:90: te prayānti bhavaṃ tyaktvā viṣṇulokam anāmayam. // MKm_39 //
GR14mdhvkmou:92: na bādhyate naro nityaṃ vāsudevam anusmaran. // MKm_40 //
GR14mdhvkmou:94: svapne 'pi ca na paśyeta yaḥ smared garuḍadhvajam. // MKm_41 //
GR14mdhvkmou:95: hṛdi rūpaṃ mukhe nāma naivedyam udare hareḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:96: pādodakaṃ ca nirmālyaṃ mastake yasya so 'cyutaḥ. // MKm_42 //
GR14mdhvkmou:98: asaṃśayaṃ dahaty āśu tūlarāśim ivānalaḥ. // MKm_43 //
GR14mdhvkmou:101: śatadhā bhedam āyāti girir vajrahato tathā. // MKm_44 //
GR14mdhvkmou:102: kṛṣṇe ratāḥ kṛṣṇam anusmarantaḥ tad bhāvitās tad gatamānasāś ca.
GR14mdhvkmou:103: te bhinnadehāḥ praviśanti viṣṇuṃ havir yathā mantrahutaṃ hutāśe. // MKm_45 //
GR14mdhvkmou:104: sā hānis tan mahat chidraṃ sā cāndhajaḍamūkatā
GR14mdhvkmou:105: yan muhūrtaṃ kṣaṇaṃ vā 'pi vāsudevo na cintyate. // MKm_46 //
GR14mdhvkmou:106: nārāyaṇo nāma naro narāṇāṃ prasaṃhya coraḥ kathitaḥ pṛthivyām
GR14mdhvkmou:109: koṭijanmārjitaṃ pāpaṃ takṣaṇād eva naśyati. // MKm_48 //
GR14mdhvkmou:110: kiṃ tasya bahubhis tīrthaiḥ kiṃ tapobhiḥ kim adhvaraiḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:111: yo nityaṃ dhyāyate devaṃ nārāyaṇam ananyadhīḥ. // MKm_49 //
GR14mdhvkmou:112: ye mānavā vigatarāgaparāvarajñā nārāyaṇaṃ suraguruṃ satataṃ smaranti
GR14mdhvkmou:113: dhyānena tena hatakilbiṣacetanāste mātuḥ payodhararasaṃ na punaḥ pibanti. // MKm_50 //
GR14mdhvkmou:114: he citta cintaya sveha vāsudevam aharniśam
GR14mdhvkmou:115: nūnaṃ yaś cintitaḥ puṃsāṃ hanti saṃsārabandhanam. // MKm_51 //
GR14mdhvkmou:116: āloḍya sarvaśāstrāṇi vicārya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:117: idam ekaṃ suniṣpannaṃ dhyeyo nārāyaṇaḥ sadā. // MKm_52 //
GR14mdhvkmou:119: puruṣas tam ajaṃ nityaṃ vrajāmi śaraṇaṃ harim. // MKm_53 //
GR14mdhvkmou:120: vedeṣu yajñeṣu tapasu caiva dāneṣu tīrtheṣu vrateṣu caiva
GR14mdhvkmou:121: iṣṭeṣu pūrteṣu ca yat pradiṣṭaṃ puṇyaṃ smṛte tat khalu vāsudeve. // MKm_54 //
GR14mdhvkmou:123: ārādhayaiva naro viṣṇuṃ manaso yad yad icchati
GR14mdhvkmou:124: phalaṃ prāpnoty avikalaṃ bhūri svalpam athāpi vā. // MKm_55 //
GR14mdhvkmou:128: prayāti vilayaṃ sadyaḥ sakṛt saṃkīrtite 'cyute. // MKm_57 //
GR14mdhvkmou:132: na pumān keśavād anyaḥ sarvapāpacikitsakaḥ. // MKm_59 //
GR14mdhvkmou:133: yad abhyarcya hariṃ bhaktyā kṛte varṣaśatair api
GR14mdhvkmou:134: phalaṃ prāpnoty avikalaṃ kalau saṃkīrtya keśavam. // MKm_60 //
GR14mdhvkmou:135: kṣīyate tu yadā dharmaḥ prāpte ghore kalau yuge
GR14mdhvkmou:136: tadā na kīrtayet kaścin muktidaṃ devam acyutam. // MKm_61 //
GR14mdhvkmou:138: pumān vimucyate sadyaḥ siṃhatrastamṛgair iva. // MKm_62 //
GR14mdhvkmou:140: tathā 'pi narake ghore majjantīty etad adbhutam. // MKm_63 //
GR14mdhvkmou:141: ārtā viṣaṇṇāḥ śithilāś ca bhītā ghoreṣu ca vyādhiṣu vartamānāḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:142: saṃkīrtya nārāyaṅaśabdamātraṃ vimuktaduḥkhāḥ sukhino bhavanti. // MKm_64 //
GR14mdhvkmou:144: sakṛd uccāritaṃ yais tu kṛṣṇeti na viśanti te
GR14mdhvkmou:145: garbhāgāraṃ gṛhaṃ mātur yamalokaṃ ca dussaham. // MKm_65 //
GR14mdhvkmou:147: kva japo vāsudeveti muktibījam anuttamam. // MKm_66 //
GR14mdhvkmou:148: buddhyā buddhvā vadasvainaṃ harir ity akṣaradvayam
GR14mdhvkmou:149: smaraṇād eva kṛṣṇasya na punarjāyate kvacit. // MKm_67 //
GR14mdhvkmou:150: he jihve mama nisnehe hariṃ kiṃ nuna bhāṣase
GR14mdhvkmou:151: hariṃ vadasva kalyāṇi saṃsārodadhinaur hariḥ. // MKm_68 //
GR14mdhvkmou:152: asāre khalu saṃsāre sārāt sārataro hariḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:153: puṇyahīnā na vindanti sāraṅgāś ca yathā jalam. // MKm_69 //
GR14mdhvkmou:154: kurukṣetreṇa kiṃ tasya kiṃ kāśyā puṣkareṇa vā
GR14mdhvkmou:155: jihvāgre vartate tasya harir ity akṣaradvayam. // MKm_70 //
GR14mdhvkmou:157: asāre khalu saṃsāre sāram ekaṃ nirūpitam
GR14mdhvkmou:159: sā jihvā yā hariṃ stauti tac cittaṃ yat tadarpaṇam
GR14mdhvkmou:160: tāv eva kevalau ślāghyau yau tatpūjākarau karau. // MKm_72 //
GR14mdhvkmou:161: yas tu viṣṇuparo nityaṃ dṛḍhabhaktir jitendriyaḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:162: svagṛhe 'pi vasan yāti tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam. // MKm_73 //
GR14mdhvkmou:165: yan māṃ pṛcchasi dharmajña keśavārādhanaṃ prati. // MKm_74 //
GR14mdhvkmou:166: nimiṣaṃ nimiṣārdhaṃ vā muhūrtam api bhārgava
GR14mdhvkmou:168: kiṃ tena manasā kāryaṃ yan na tiṣṭhati keśave
GR14mdhvkmou:170: rogo nāma na sā jihvā yayā na stūyate hariḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:171: gartau nāma na tau karṇau yābhyāṃ tat karma na śrutam. // MKm_77 //
GR14mdhvkmou:173: rogo nāma na sā jihvā yā na vakti harer guṇān. // MKm_78 //
GR14mdhvkmou:174: bhārabhūtaiḥ kāryam ebhiḥ kiṃ tasya nṛpaśor dvija
GR14mdhvkmou:176: te ca netre mahābhāga yābhyāṃ sandṛśyate hariḥ. // MKm_79 //
GR14mdhvkmou:177: kiṃ tasya caraṇaiḥ kāryaṃ vṛthāsañcaraṇair dvija
GR14mdhvkmou:178: yair hi na vrajate jantuḥ keśavālayadarśane. // MKm_80 //
GR14mdhvkmou:180: ṛṣitvam api dharmajña vijñeyaṃ tatprasādajam. // MKm_81 //
GR14mdhvkmou:184: nāsau tat phalam āpnoti tadbhaktair yad avāpyate. // MKm_83 //
GR14mdhvkmou:185: re re manuṣyāḥ puruṣottamasya karau na kasmān mukulīkurudhve
GR14mdhvkmou:186: kriyājuṣāṃ ko bhavatāṃ prayāsaḥ phalaṃ hi yat padam acyutasya. // MKm_84 //
GR14mdhvkmou:187: viṣṇor vimānaṃ yaḥ kuryāt sakṛd bhaktyā pradakṣiṇam
GR14mdhvkmou:189: pradakṣiṇaṃ tu yaḥ kuryād haribhaktyā samanvitaḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:193: urasā śirasā dṛṣṭyā manasā vacasā tathā
GR14mdhvkmou:194: padbhyāṃ karābhyāṃ jānubhyāṃ praṇāmo 'ṣṭāṅga īritaḥ. // MKm_88 //
GR14mdhvkmou:196: śātajanmārjitaṃ pāpaṃ naśyaty eva na saṃśayaḥ. // MKm_89 //
GR14mdhvkmou:198: nānyo dharttā jagannāthaṃ muktvā nārāyaṇaṃ param. // MKm_90 //
GR14mdhvkmou:202: anyadevasya naivedyaṃ bhuktvā cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret. // MKm_92 //
GR14mdhvkmou:204: yat phalaṃ labhyate pumbhir viṣṇor naivedya bhakṣaṇāt. // MKm_93 //
GR14mdhvkmou:206: samudragās tu pakṣasya māsasya saritāṃ patiḥ. // MKm_94 //
GR14mdhvkmou:210: kālena tīrthasalilāni punanti pāpaṃ pādodakaṃ bhagavataḥ prapunāti sadyaḥ. // MKm_96 //
GR14mdhvkmou:211: yāni kāni ca tīrthāni brahmāṇḍāntargatāni vai
GR14mdhvkmou:213: snānaṃ pādodakaṃ viṣṇoḥ piban śirasi dhārayan
GR14mdhvkmou:214: sarva pāpavinirmukto vaiṣṇavīṃ siddhim āpnuyāt. // MKm_98 //
GR14mdhvkmou:216: naivedyaṃ dhūpaśeṣaṃ ca ārārttiś ca tathā hareḥ. // MKm_99 //
GR14mdhvkmou:217: tulasyās tu rajojuṣṭaṃ naivedyasya ca bhakṣaṇam
GR14mdhvkmou:219: bhaktyā vā yadi vā 'bhaktyā cakrāṅkitaśilām prati
GR14mdhvkmou:224: yojanāni tathā trīṇi mama kṣetraṃ vasundhare. // MKm_103 //
GR14mdhvkmou:226: yatrāpi nīyate tatra vāraṇasyā śatādhikam. // MKm_104 //
GR14mdhvkmou:228: ubhayoḥ saṃgamo yatra tatra muktir na saṃśayaḥ. // MKm_105 //
GR14mdhvkmou:230: sa yasya sarvabhāveṣu tasya taiḥ kiṃ prayojanam. // MKm_106 //
GR14mdhvkmou:231: harir yāti harir yāti dasyuvyājena yo vadet
GR14mdhvkmou:232: so 'pi sadgatim āpnoti gatiṃ sukṛtino yathā. // MKm_107 //
GR14mdhvkmou:234: tyaktvā 'mṛtaṃ sa mūḍhātmā bhuṅkte hālāhalaṃ viṣam. // MKm_108 //
GR14mdhvkmou:235: tyaktvāmṛtaṃ yathā kaścid anyapānaṃ piben naraḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:236: tathā hariṃ parityajya cānyaṃ devam upāsate. // MKm_109 //
GR14mdhvkmou:237: svadharmaṃ tu parityajya paradharmaṃ yathā caret
GR14mdhvkmou:238: tathā hariṃ parityajya cānyaṃ devam upāsate. // MKm_110 //
GR14mdhvkmou:239: gāṃ ca tyaktvā vimūḍhātmā gardabhīṃ vandate yathā
GR14mdhvkmou:240: tathā hariṃ parityajya cānyaṃ devam upāsate. // MKm_111 //
GR14mdhvkmou:242: tṛṣito jāhnavītīre kūpaṃ khanati durmatiḥ. // MKm_112 //
GR14mdhvkmou:243: yathā gaṅgodakaṃ tyaktvā pibet kūpodakaṃ naraḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:244: tathā hariṃ parityajya yo 'nyaṃ devam upāsate. // MKm_113 //
GR14mdhvkmou:246: tathā hariṃ parityajya yo 'nyaṃ devam upāsate. // MKm_114 //
GR14mdhvkmou:247: yāvat svastham idaṃ piṇḍaṃ nirujaṃ karaṇānvitam
GR14mdhvkmou:248: tāvat kuruṣvā 'tmahitaṃ paścāt tāpena tapyase. // MKm_115 //
GR14mdhvkmou:249: yāvat svāsthyaṃ śarīreṣu karaṇeṣu ca pāṭavam
GR14mdhvkmou:250: tāvad arcaya govindam āyuśyaṃ sārthakaṃ kuru. // MKm_116 //
GR14mdhvkmou:251: smaryatāṃ tu hṛṣīkeśo hṛṣīkeṣu dṛḍheṣu ca
GR14mdhvkmou:252: adṛḍheṣu hṛṣīkeṣu hṛṣīkeśaṃ smaranti ke. // MKm_117 //
GR14mdhvkmou:254: tāvac cet smarate viṣṇuṃ ko na mucyeta bandhanāt. // MKm_118 //
GR14mdhvkmou:256: tāvac cet smarate viṣṇuṃ ko na mucyeta bandhanāt. // MKm_119 //
GR14mdhvkmou:258: jñātvā viprās tithiṃ samyag daivajñaiḥ samudīritām
GR14mdhvkmou:259: kartavya upavāsaś ca anyathā narakaṃ vrajet. // MKm_120 //
GR14mdhvkmou:260: kṣaye vā 'py athavā vṛddhau samprāpte vā dinakṣaye
GR14mdhvkmou:261: upoṣyā dvādaśī puṇyā pūrvaviddhāṃ parityajet. // MKm_121 //
GR14mdhvkmou:263: saṃtates tu vināśāya sampado haraṇāya ca. // MKm_122 //
GR14mdhvkmou:265: surāyā bindunā spṛṣṭaṃ gaṅgāmbha iva santyajet. // MKm_123 //
GR14mdhvkmou:266: śvadṛtau pañcagavyaṃ ca daśamyā dūṣitāṃ tyajet
GR14mdhvkmou:267: ekādaśīṃ dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ pakṣayor ubhayor api. // MKm_124 //
GR14mdhvkmou:268: tasmād viprā na viddhā hi kartavyaikādasī kvacit
GR14mdhvkmou:269: viddhā hanti purāpuṇyaṃ śrāddhaṃ ca vṛṣalīpatiḥ. // MKm_125 //
GR14mdhvkmou:270: japtaṃ dattaṃ hutaṃ snātaṃ tathā pūjā kṛtā hareḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:271: tat sarvaṃ vilayaṃ yāti tamaḥ sūryodaye yathā. // MKm_126 //
GR14mdhvkmou:273: upoṣyā dvādaśī tatra trayodaśyāṃ tu pāraṇam. // MKm_127 //
GR14mdhvkmou:284: udayāt prāk trighaṭikā vyāpiny ekādaśī yadā
GR14mdhvkmou:287: tatra kratuśataṃ puṇyaṃ trayodaśyāṃ tu pāraṇaṃ. // MKm_134 //
GR14mdhvkmou:291: tatra kratuśataṃ puṇyaṃ trayodaśyāṃ tu pāraṇam. // MKm_136 //
GR14mdhvkmou:293: tasyāḥ putraśataṃ naṣṭaṃ tasmāt tāṃ parivarjayet. // MKm_137 //
GR14mdhvkmou:295: upoṣyā dvādaśī puṇyā trayodaśyāṃ tu pāraṅam. // MKm_138 //
GR14mdhvkmou:296: ekādaśyāṃ tu viddhāyāṃ samprāpte śravaṇe tathā
GR14mdhvkmou:297: upoṣyā dvādaśī puṇyā pakṣayor ubhayor api. // MKm_139 //
GR14mdhvkmou:299: amālakṣaṃ tu dvādaśyāḥ kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm. // MKm_140 //
GR14mdhvkmou:300: śuddhāpi dvādaśī grāhyā parato dvādaśī yadi
GR14mdhvkmou:301: viṣaṃ tu daśamī jñeyā 'mṛtaṃ caikādaśī tithiḥ.
GR14mdhvkmou:302: viṣapradhānā varjyā sā 'mṛtā grāhyā pradhānataḥ. // MKm_141 //
GR14mdhvkmou:304: yaḥ kuryān mandabuddhitvān nirayaṃ so 'dhigacchati. // MKm_142 //
GR14mdhvkmou:305: yāni kāni ca vākyāni viddhopāsyāparāṇi tu
GR14mdhvkmou:306: dhanadārcāparāṇi syur vaiṣṇavī na daśāyutā. // MKm_143 //
GR14mdhvkmou:308: arthitaḥ kārayām āsa vyāsarūpī janārdanaḥ. // MKm_144 //
GR14mdhvkmou:314: tataḥ koṭiguṇaṃ vā 'pi niṣiddhasyetarair janaiḥ. // MKm_146 //
GR14mdhvkmou:315: yad anādikṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tad ūrdhvaṃ yat kariṣyati
GR14mdhvkmou:316: tat sarvaṃ vilayaṃ yāti pareṣām upavāsanāt
GR14mdhvkmou:317: na ca tasmāt priyatamaḥ keśavasya mamāpi vā. // MKm_147 //
GR14mdhvkmou:318: ekādaśyā hy avedhe tu dvādaśīṃ na parityajet
GR14mdhvkmou:319: pāraṇe maraṇe caiva tithis tātkālikī smṛtā. // MKm_148 //
GR14mdhvkmou:320: brahmacārī gṛhastho vā vānaprastho yatis tathā
GR14mdhvkmou:321: brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdro bhartṛmatī tathā. // MKm_149 //
GR14mdhvkmou:323: ekādaśyāṃ na bhuñjīta pakṣayor ubhayor api. // MKm_150 //
GR14mdhvkmou:325: śuklāyām atha kṛṣṇāyāṃ nirayaṃ yāti sa dhruvam. // MKm_151 //
GR14mdhvkmou:326: vivecayati yo mohāc chuklā kṛṣṇeti pāpakṛt
GR14mdhvkmou:327: ekādaśīṃ sa vai yāti nirayaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ. // MKm_152 //
GR14mdhvkmou:328: yathā gaur naiva hantavyā śuklā kṛṣṇeti bhāmini
GR14mdhvkmou:329: ekadāśyāṃ na bhuñjīta pakṣayor ubhayor api. // MKm_153 //
GR14mdhvkmou:333: prīṇanārthaṃ harer nityaṃ na tu kāmavyapekṣayā. // MKm_155 //
GR14mdhvkmou:334: tasmāc chuklām atho kṛṣṇāṃ bharaṇyādiyutām api
GR14mdhvkmou:336: prīṇanārthaṃ hareś vāpi viṣṇulokasya cā 'ptaye. // MKm_156 //
GR14mdhvkmou:337: kalā vā ghaṭikā vā 'pi apare dvādaśī yadi
GR14mdhvkmou:338: dvādaśadvādaśīr hanti pūrvedyuḥ pāraṇe kṛte. // MKm_157 //
GR14mdhvkmou:339: atiriktā dvādaśī cet sa tāṃ nopoṣayed yadi
GR14mdhvkmou:342: dvādaśadvādaśīr hanti dvādaśīṃ na parityajet. // MKm_159 //
GR14mdhvkmou:346: na tatra vidhilopaḥ syād ubhayor devatā hariḥ. // MKm_161 //
GR14mdhvkmou:350: na kāśī na gayā gaṅgā na reva na ca gautamī
GR14mdhvkmou:351: na cāpi kauravaṃ kṣetraṃ samā bhūpa harer dināt. // MKm_163 //
GR14mdhvkmou:356: nedṛśaṃ pāvanaṃ kiñcin narāṇāṃ bhuvi vidyate
GR14mdhvkmou:359: yāvan nopoṣayej jantuḥ padmanābhadinaṃ śivam. // MKm_167 //
GR14mdhvkmou:360: ekādaśendriyaiḥ pāpaṃ yat kṛtaṃ bhavati prabho
GR14mdhvkmou:361: ekādaśyupavāsena tat sarvaṃ vilayaṃ nayet. // MKm_168 //
GR14mdhvkmou:363: vyājenāpi kṛtā rājan na darśayati bhāskarim. // MKm_169 //
GR14mdhvkmou:365: sa brahmahā sa goghnaś ca stenaḥ sa gurutalpagaḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:366: ekādaśyāṃ tu bhuñjānaḥ pakṣayor ubhayor api. // MKm_170 //
GR14mdhvkmou:368: varaṃ hatyā surāpānam ekādaśyāṃ tu bhojanāt. // MKm_171 //
GR14mdhvkmou:370: avalokya mukhaṃ teṣām ādityam avalokayet. // MKm_172 //
GR14mdhvkmou:372: annam āśritya tiṣṭhanti samprāpte harivāsare. // MKm_173 //
GR14mdhvkmou:374: aṣṭavarṣādhiko yas tu aśītir na hi pūryate
GR14mdhvkmou:375: yo bhuṅkte mānavaḥ pāpo viṣṇor ahani cāgate. // MKm_174 //
GR14mdhvkmou:376: pitā vā yadi vā putro bhāryā vā 'pi suhṛjjanaḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:377: padmanābhadine bhuṅkte nigrāhyo dasyuvad bhavet. // MKm_175 //
GR14mdhvkmou:387: na paśyati yamaṃ vā 'pi narakān na ca yātanām. // MKm_179 //
GR14mdhvkmou:389: na bhoktavyaṃ na bhoktavyaṃ samprāpte harivāsare. // MKm_180 //
GR14mdhvkmou:390: dvādaśī na pramoktavyā yāvad āyuḥ pravartate
GR14mdhvkmou:392: bhaktyā grāhyo hṛṣīkeśo na dhanair dharaṇīsurāḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:393: bhaktyā sampūjito viṣṇuḥ phalaṃ datte samīhitam. // MKm_182 //
GR14mdhvkmou:395: paritoṣaṃ prayāty āśu tṛṣārtās tu yathā jalaiḥ. // MKm_183 //
GR14mdhvkmou:397: ramasva puṇḍarīkākṣa hṛdaye mama sarvadā. // MKm_184 //
GR14mdhvkmou:399: ramasva puṇḍarīkākṣa nṛsiṃha hṛdaye mama. // MKm_185 //
GR14mdhvkmou:401: bhavapaṅkārṇave ghore majjato mama sarvadā. // MKm_186 //
GR14mdhvkmou:404: etat puṇyaṃ paraṃ guhyaṃ pavitraṃ pāpanāśanam
GR14mdhvkmou:405: āyuṣyaṃ ca yaśasyaṃ ca kaliduḥsvapnanāśanam. // MKm_188 //
GR14mdhvkmou:407: smṛte manasi govinde dahyate tūlarāśivat. // MKm_189 //
GR14mdhvkmou:408: kalau keśavabhaktānāṃ na bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit
GR14mdhvkmou:409: smṛte saṃkīrtite dhyāte saṃkṣayaṃ yāti pātakam. // MKm_190 //
GR14mdhvkmou:411: bhaktebhyaś ca pradātavyaṃ dhārmikebhyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ. // MKm_191 //
GR14mdhvkmou:412: adhīyāna idaṃ śāstram viṣṇor māhātmyam uttamam
GR14mdhvkmou:414: śrutvā dharmaṃ vijānāti śrutvā tyajati durmatim
GR14mdhvkmou:415: śrutvā jñānam avāpnoti śrutvā mokṣaṃ ca gacchati. // MKm_193 //
GR14mdhvkmou:416: tasmād idaṃ samāśrāvyaṃ śrotavyaṃ ca sadaiva hi
GR14mdhvkmou:421: tīrthakoṭisahasrais tu snāto bhavati pratyaham. // MKm_196 //
GR14mdhvkmou:423: toyaṃ yadi piben nityaṃ sāḷagrāmaśilācyutam. // MKm_197 //
GR14mdhvkmou:425: vāñchanti karasaṃsparśaṃ teṣāṃ devāḥ savāsavāḥ. // MKm_198 //
GR14mdhvkmou:429: smaraṇaṃ kīrtanaṃ viṣṇoḥ sadaiva na parityajet. // MKm_200 //
GR14mdhvkmou:432: naśyanti sakalā rogāḥ satyaṃ satyaṃ vadāmy aham. // MKm_201 //
GR14mdhvkmou:433: sakṛd uccāritaṃ yena harir ity akṣaradvayam
GR14mdhvkmou:434: baddhaḥ parikaras tena mokṣāya gamanaṃ prati. // MKm_202 //
GR14mdhvkmou:435: evaṃ brahmādayo devā ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:436: kīrtayanti suraśreṣṭhaṃ devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum. // MKm_203 //
GR14mdhvkmou:437: kiṃ tasya dānaiḥ kiṃ tīrthaiḥ kiṃ tapobhiḥ kim adhvaraiḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:438: yo nityaṃ dhyāyate devaṃ nārāyaṇam ananyadhīḥ. // MKm_204 //
GR14mdhvkmou:439: nityotsavo nityatā ca nityaśrīr nityaśo jayaḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:440: yeṣāṃ hṛdistho bhagavān maṅgalāyatano hariḥ. // MKm_205 //
GR14mdhvkmou:441: jīvaṃś caturdaśād ūrdhvaṃ puruṣo niyamena tu
GR14mdhvkmou:442: strī vā 'py anūnadaśakaṃ dehaṃ mānuṣam ārjate. // MKm_206 //
GR14mdhvkmou:444: ato 'vittvā paraṃ devaṃ mokṣāśā kā mahāmune. // MKm_207 //
GR14mdhvkmou:447: ataḥ karmakṣayān muktiḥ kuta eva bhaviṣyati. // MKm_208 //
GR14mdhvkmou:448: samānāṃ viṣamā pūjā viṣamāṇāṃ samā tathā
GR14mdhvkmou:449: kriyate yena devo 'pi svapadād bhraśyate hi saḥ. // MKm_209 //
GR14mdhvkmou:450: vittaṃ bandhur vayaḥ karma vidyā caiva tu pañcamī
GR14mdhvkmou:451: etāni mānyasthānāni garīyo yad yad uttaram. // MKm_210 //
GR14mdhvkmou:452: guṇānusāriṇīṃ pūjāṃ samāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ ca yo naraḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:453: sarvabhūteṣu kurute tasya viṣṇuḥ prasīdati. // MKm_211 //
GR14mdhvkmou:455: tathā karoti pūjādi samabuddhiḥ sa ucyate. // MKm_212 //
GR14mdhvkmou:456: tiryakpuṇḍraṃ na kurvīta samprāpte maraṇe 'pi ca
GR14mdhvkmou:457: na cānyan nāma vibrūyāt paraṃ nārāyaṇādṛte. // MKm_213 //
GR14mdhvkmou:458: naivedyaśeṣaṃ devasya yo bhunakti dine dine
GR14mdhvkmou:459: sikthe sikthe bhavet puṇyaṃ cāndrāyaṇaśatādhikam. // MKm_214 //
GR14mdhvkmou:461: sa caṇḍālo 'pi śuddhātmā pūjya eva na saṃśayaḥ. // MKm_215 //
GR14mdhvkmou:462: aśucir vā 'py anācāro manasā pāpam ācaran
GR14mdhvkmou:463: śucir eva bhaven nityam ūrdhvapuṇḍrānkito naraḥ. // MKm_216 //
GR14mdhvkmou:465: avalokya mukhaṃ teṣām ādityam avalokayet. // MKm_217 //
GR14mdhvkmou:466: yajño dānaṃ tapaś caiva svādhyāyaḥ pitṛtarpaṇam
GR14mdhvkmou:467: vyarthaṃ bhavati tat sarvam ūrdhvapuṇḍraṃ vinā kṛtam. // MKm_218 //
GR14mdhvkmou:469: taṃ taṃ śuddhaṃ vijānīyān nātra kāryā vicāraṇā. // MKm_219 //
GR14mdhvkmou:471: vaiṣṇavo 'smatkule jātaḥ sa naḥ santārayiṣyati. // MKm_220 //
GR14mdhvkmou:473: na tu kalpasahasrais tu bhaktihīnasya keśave. // MKm_221 //
GR14mdhvkmou:475: yo jāto nārcayed viṣṇuṃ na smaren nāpi kīrtayet. // MKm_222 //
GR14mdhvkmou:477: api sarṣapamātreṇa punāty āsaptamaṃ kulam. // MKm_223 //
GR14mdhvkmou:481: etādṛśo 'pi nā 'cāraṃ śrautaṃ smārtaṃ parityajet. // MKm_225 //
GR14mdhvkmou:484: kurvan eveha karmāṇi jijīviṣec chataṃ samāḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:485: evaṃ tvayi nānyatheto 'sti na karma lipyate nare. // MKm_227 //
GR14mdhvkmou:486: ācāraś caiva sādhūnām ātmanas tuṣṭir eva ca
GR14mdhvkmou:487: vedapraṇihito dharmo hy adharmas tadviparyayaḥ. // MKm_228 //
GR14mdhvkmou:488: niṣkāmaṃ jñānapūrvaṃ tu nivṛttam iha cocyate
GR14mdhvkmou:489: nivṛttaṃ sevamānas tu brahmābhyeti sanātanam. // MKm_229 //
